my_collections_info: Find and mangage all your collections here!
controls_collection_info: Manage your collection and its properties.
name: Name
nft_esdt_info: NFT are non-fungible tokens that can represent unique assets. They are ideal for digital art, and other items where uniqueness is essential. Each NFT has a unique identifier and can have its own properties.
sft_esdt_info: SFT are semi-fungible tokens that can represent a limited number of identical assets. They are suitable for items like event tickets or limited edition collectibles, where a specific quantity is available but each item is not unique.
meta_esdt_info: META-ESDTs are similar to SFT collections, but they support decimals, making them suitable for representing fractional assets. Their usage is more complex and typically intended to be managed through a smart contract factory, especially when handling attributes, dynamic minting, or evolving logic.
dynamic_info: Dynamic collections are a type of ESDT that can change their properties over time. They are ideal for applications where the asset's characteristics may evolve, such as in gaming or dynamic art.
name_tooltip: The name of the collection, which will be displayed in the wallet and on explorers. Length between 3 and 20 characters alphanumeric characters only
ticker_tooltip: The ticker of the collection, which is a short identifier used to represent the collection in transactions and on explorers. Length between 3 and 10 characters alphanumeric UPPERCASE only
pause_tooltip: Pausing a collection prevents any NFT transfers.
change_properties_time: Changes to the collectionâ€™s properties are applied instantly on-chain, but may take hours to be reflected on explorers.
convert_to_dynamic_warning: This will upgrade your collection to a dynamic one. Dynamics collections cannot be downgraded to non dynamic collections.
transfer_create_role_info: Can create role can be assigned to only one address at a time. This action will remove the role from the current address and assign it to the new address.
freeze_wallet_info: Freezing an account prevents any NFT transfers to or from the specified address. You may freeze the whole collection or a specific nonce.
unfreeze_wallet_info: Unfreezing an account allows NFT transfers to and from the specified address. You may unfreeze the whole collection or a specific nonce.
nonce_to_freeze: Nonce (optional) leave zero to freeze the whole collection
nonce_to_unfreeze: Nonce (optional) leave zero to unfreeze the whole collection
canFreeze: Enable freezing of NFTs in this collection. This allow to freeze and unfreeze NFTs in a specific wallet.
canWipe: Enable wiping of NFTs in this collection. This allow to wipe NFTs in a frozen wallet.
canPause: Enable pausing of NFTs in this collection. While pause, no NFT transfers can be made.
canTransferNFTCreateRole: Allow to transfer the creation role of this collection to another address. This is useful if you want to delegate the creation of NFTs to another account.
canChangeOwner: Allow to change the owner of this collection. This is useful if you want to transfer the ownership of the collection to another account.
canUpgrade: Allow to change properties of this collection. If unset the collection will be immutable and no properties can be changed.
canAddSpecialRoles: Allow to add special roles to this collection. This is useful if you want to assign specific permissions to accounts.
ESDTRoleNFTCreate: Grants a specific account permission to create NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow NFT creation.
ESDTRoleNFTBurn: Grants a specific account permission to burn NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow NFT burning.
ESDTRoleNFTUpdateAttributes: Grants a specific account permission to update NFT attributes within this collection. Set this role to allow updating NFT attributes.
ESDTRoleNFTAddURI: Grants a specific account permission to add a new URI to NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow adding a new URI.
ESDTRoleNFTAddQuantity: Grants a specific account permission to add quantity to NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow adding quantity.
ESDTTransferRole: By default, everyone can transfer NFTs within this collection. Once this role is set, only the accounts with this role can transfer NFTs within this collection.
ESDTRoleNFTUpdate: Grants a specific account permission to update NFT properties within this collection. Set this role to allow updating NFT properties.
ESDTRoleModifyRoyalties: Grants a specific account permission to modify royalties for NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow modifying royalties.
ESDTRoleSetNewURI: Grants a specific account permission to set a new URI for NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow setting a new URI.
ESDTRoleModifyCreator: Grants a specific account permission to become the creator of NFTs within this collection. Royalties are sent to the creator.
ESDTRoleNFTRecreate: Grants a specific account permission to recreate NFTs within this collection. Set this role to allow recreating NFTs.
